thread.title: Hadi backs Nik Amar, tells Mahfuz to toe the line or quit
thread.title_full: Hadi backs Nik Amar, tells Mahfuz to toe the line or quit

title: Hadi backs Nik Amar, tells Mahfuz to toe the line or quit
text:
More 
PAS president Abdul Hadi Awang has thrown his weight behind Kelantan deputy menteri besar Mohd Amar Nik Abdullah who had challenged PAS' Pokok Sena MP Mahfuz Omar to quit the party. 
"If he is a PAS man then he should follow the PAS way. If he refuses to follow PAS' ways, then he should quit. 
"I support Nik Amar's statement," he told a press conference in Marang, Terengganu today, a video of which was uploaded on Terengganukini .
